<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81428</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4792</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pilgrimage Para Liturgy</string>
            <string language="es">Paraliturgia para el peregrinaje</string>
            <string language="ga">Oilithreacht trí Liotúirge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pilgrimage-Punkte Liturgie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liturgie de Para. De Pélerinage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Liturgy De Parágrafos Do Pilgrimage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Liturgy Di Paragrafi Di Pilgrimage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργία παραγράφου προσκυνήματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A short para-liturgy suitable for use with a group visiting a place of pilgrimage.</string>
            <string language="es">Una paraliturgia breve adecuada para usarla con un grupo que visite un lugar de peregrinaje.</string>
            <string language="ga">Liotúirge gearr feiliúnach do ghrúpa atá ag tabhairt cuairt ar áit oilithreachta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Billeog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine kurze Punkt-Liturgie verwendbar für Gebrauch
mit einer Gruppe, die einen Ort von Pilgrimage besichtigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une Para.-liturgie courte appropriée pour l'usage
avec un groupe visitant un endroit de pélerinage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um parágrafo-para-liturgy curto apropriado para o
uso com um grupo que visita um lugar do pilgrimage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un paragrafo-para-liturgy corto adatto ad uso con 
un gruppo che visita un posto del pilgrimage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σύντομη παράγραφος-λειτουργία κατάλληλη για τη 
χρήση με μια ομάδα που επισκέπτεται μια θέση του προσκυνήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
